input.sentences: the famous center was known for its landscaping .
the greenhouse was an indoor botanical treat .
fountains were adorned with flowers and shrubs .
notable structures | like a traditional red phone booth | were present .
the lake was especially beautiful to view .
output.sentences: This is one of the neatest gardens we saw on our vacation.
